attributes.action: support SSAFA's application to create a facility for families of injured servicemen in Astead, Surrey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Soldier, Sailor and Airman's association has applied to change the use of a residential house in Astead to allow the accommodation families of injured servicemen being treated in nearby Headley Court.  They have come up against considerable local opposition, and it is likely that the application will be rejected.  Please lend your support to SSAFA's attempt to improve facilities for the families of those who have been injured in the service of this country, and add your name below.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
